body:
Comment 6: 
Why not simply document this? I made a CL with this rewording of the OSX installation
instructions in doc/install.html before I found that the issue was logged:

"Open the package file and follow the prompts to install the Go tools. On Mountain Lion
you will need to hold down the control key when clicking the package and then select
Open from the appearing menu to be prompted to install Go as unsigned software. The
package installs the Go distribution to /usr/local/go."
